release_notes.en-US: just fix warning in manifest and add removeEventListner as suggested by reviewer. No functional change.

description.en-US:
Mail coming from notes servers cut hyperlink and insert \
in the url.
Simply wish to replace this with / and remove the newline. This fixes the active href without modifying the text on screen - looks same but the link will work. 
Only works for MASFLOW links probaly making it ESA specific  - could be extended easily.

caption.en-US: The broken link is actually fixed see the status bar.

summary.en-US:
Fixes the HREF on MASFLOW links in emails from Lotus Notes. 
If you dont know what that is you do not  need this.
